subject: any suggestion for these issues ?
msgSnippet: hello, I have to test a bussiness rules that received several beans as input parameter. And there are 2 issue that i have to concern. 1- the method insert
messageBody:
hello,

I have to test a bussiness rules that received several beans as
input parameter. And there are 2 issue that i have to concern.
1- the method insert record in a table, how can i test it's inserting
right records ? Also , it's make mofification in other fields,
recalculating amount for example.
2- I have to hardcode values for those beans, that means that i have
to initiate those values at begging of each method ? which are the
more polite way to face this issue ?

Is the "divide and conquer" the only solution ?
Thank for your suggestions
Adrian
